history.proof: intros H_int. destruct H_int as [If H_if]. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_RInt_comp_lin.

exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V u, v, a, b : R If : V H_if : is_RInt f (u * a + v) (u * b + v) If Unable to unify "forall P : V -> Prop, locally ?M2375 P -> filtermap (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (?M2374 - ?M2373)) (Riemann_sum (fun y : R => scal u (?M2370 (u * y + v))) ptd)) (Riemann_fine ?M2373 ?M2374) P" with "exists If : V, is_RInt (fun y : R => scal u (f (u * y + v))) a b If".

original: intros H_int. destruct H_int as [If H_if]. apply is_RInt_comp_lin with (u := u) (v := v). auto.
